messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to American April Waypoint 61. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 7 viral biohazard aboard American April Waypoint 61. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Betzi-Beelei (Chief Medical Officer)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">This is your CMO Betzi-Beelei who is a lizard and we have a clueless virologist and a furry doctor . . . t h i s  i s  n o t  f i n e</font>

messages.author: Betzi-Beelei (Chief Medical Officer)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">S U I T  S E N S O R  P L E A S E</font>
